description: This file defines a React-style functional component using Qwik's component$ API, rendering a gauge with a customizable value, styled via CSS modules, and drawing SVG elements with gradient fills.

methods.name: default
methods.description: A Qwik component that renders a gauge SVG with a value indicator. Accepts a numeric 'value' prop with default 50, constrains it between 0 and 100, and visualizes it using SVG stroke dasharray.
